00026     RotatedSequence::RotatedSequence(const bpp::Sequence* a, const uint &i) :
00027       bpp::Sequence(*a)
00028       {
00029         this->offset = i;
00030       }

00032     RotatedSequence::~RotatedSequence()
00033       {
00034       }

00036     int RotatedSequence::getValue(unsigned int pos) const
00037         throw (bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException)
00038       {
00039 
00040         pos = ((pos+offset) % this->size());
00041         if (pos > this->size())
00042           throw bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException("SymbolList::getChar. Invalid position.", pos, 0, size() - 1);
00043         return _content[pos];
00044       }
00045 
00046     string RotatedSequence::getChar(unsigned int pos) const
00047         throw (bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException)
00048       {
00049         pos = ((pos+offset) % this->size());
00050         if (pos > this->size())
00051           throw bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException("SymbolList::getChar. Invalid position.", pos, 0, size() - 1);
00052         string c = "";
00053         try
00054           {
00055             c = _alphabet -> intToChar(_content[pos]);
00056           }
00057         catch(bpp::BadIntException bie)
00058           {
00059 
00060             //This should never happen!
00061           }
00062         return c;
00063       }
00064 
00065     const int & RotatedSequence::operator[](unsigned int i) const
00066       {
00067         i = ((i+offset) % this->size());
00068         return _content[i];
00069       }
00070     int & RotatedSequence::operator[](unsigned int i)
00071       {
00072         i = ((i+offset) % this->size());
00073         return _content[i];
00074       }
00075     string RotatedSequence::toString() const
00076       {
00077         string result = "";
00078         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size(); i++)
00079           {
00080             result += _alphabet -> intToChar(getValue(i));
00081           }
00082         return result;
00083       };
